thread.title: Great hotel for Groups
thread.title_full: Great hotel for Groups - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: richardhL2697IW
title: Great hotel for Groups
text: For the past two years I have brought university theatre groups to the Row Hotel. The location is ideal and the hotel is perfect for these trips. Grace V in group sales is excellent and has always handled and accommodated our needs. I love to visit with Jacob at the coffee bar every morning, and Sam in luggage is perfect at what he does. As a University Theatre Professor, I encourage other universities to book with the ROW.
